name: Airtable Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Airtable events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Airtable Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Airtable events occur

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: airtableApi

baseId.name: baseId
baseId.description: The Airtable Base in which to operate on
baseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Base | 作用: The Airtable Base in which to operate on | 默认值: {'mode': 'url', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 默认值: {'mode': 'url', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

triggerField.name: triggerField
triggerField.description: A Created Time or Last Modified Time field that will be used to sort records. If you do not have a Created Time or Last Modified Time field in your schema, please create one, because without this field trigger will not work correctly.
triggerField.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger Field | 作用: A Created Time or Last Modified Time field that will be used to sort records. If you do not have a Created Time or Last Modified Time field in your schema, please create one, because without this field trigger will not work correctly. | (必填项)

downloadAttachments.name: downloadAttachments
downloadAttachments.description: Whether the attachment fields define in 'Download Fields' will be downloaded
downloadAttachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Attachments | 作用: Whether the attachment fields define in 'Download Fields' will be downloaded | 默认值: False

downloadFieldNames.name: downloadFieldNames
downloadFieldNames.description: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive.
downloadFieldNames.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Fields | 作用: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Fields to be included in the response. Multiple ones can be set separated by comma. Example: `name, id`. By default just the trigger field will be included.
formula (值: None) - Formulas may involve functions, numeric operations, logical operations, and text operations that operate on fields. More info here.
viewId (值: None) - The name or ID of a view in the table. If set, only the records in that view will be returned.
